title: Theologicall rules, to guide vs in the vnderstanding and practise of holy Scriptures two centuries: drawne partly out of Scriptures themselues: partly out of ecclesiasticall writers old and new. Also Ænigmata sacra, holy riddles; or misticall cases and secrets of diuinitie, with their resolutions. Foure centuries: the vnfolding whereof layeth open that truth that concerneth saluation. By T.W. preacher of the word.
author: Wilson, Thomas, 1563-1622.
publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin for Fran. Burton, and are to be solde in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the greene Dragon,
notes: T.W. = Thomas Wilson. Sometimes erroneously attributed to Thomas Walkington.
"Ænigmata sacra" has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
